Rss Feed And New Portfolio Page / 16 July 2013

I’ve made a few small updates to the site today, including the addition of an RSS feed and a new page to house my web portfolio. There are only a few projects listed for now, but I’ll be updating it constantly as I bring projects over to the new infrastructure I’m in the process of building.
